function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate positioning of UV tubes for germicidal sources resulting in ineffective disinfection of ventilation ducts and flowing air.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases due to insufficient disinfection of air in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Conduct a thorough analysis to determine the optimal positioning of UV tubes and ensure effective disinfection.","Technologies":"UV tube positioning simulation software, advanced airflow modeling tools.","People":"Building occupants, general public, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Building designers, facility managers, ventilation system experts."},{"Description":"Inaccurate calculation of required power input for UV tubes leading to underperformance or excessive energy consumption.","Impact":"Inefficient germicidal treatment of air, potential increase in energy costs, and environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Use reliable calculation methods and consider energy-efficient UV tube models.","Technologies":"Energy calculation software, UV tube power consumption modeling tools.","People":"Building owners, energy consultants, environmental experts.","Owner":"Energy experts, facility managers, HVAC contractors."},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of environmental impact in the selection of energy sources for germicidal treatment.","Impact":"Higher environmental impact from energy sources, contributing to pollution and climate change.","Mitigation":"Evaluate energy sources based on their environmental impact and prioritize renewable and low-emission options.","Technologies":"Environmental impact assessment tools, energy source comparison software.","People":"General public, environmental advocates, policymakers.","Owner":"Energy consultants, environmental experts, policymakers."}]}
